snippet: With so many open races and ambitious candidates, particularly on the Republican side, using party labels is an insufficient means of swaying voters in the March 4 primary.
lead_paragraph: With so many open races and ambitious candidates, particularly on the Republican side, using party labels is an insufficient means of swaying voters in the March 4 primary.

headline.main: In the Party, but Trying Hard to Stand Out
headline.print_headline: In the Party, but Trying Hard to Stand Out
